title: Weather & Seasons
description: Learn vocabulary about weather conditions and seasonal activities.

words.meaning: how hot or cold something is
words.example: The temperature is 25 degrees today.

words.meaning: a prediction about future weather
words.example: The forecast says it will rain tomorrow.
words.exampleMeaning: 일기 예보에 따르면 내일 비가 올 거래요.

words.meaning: having a lot of water in the air
words.example: Summer in Korea is very humid.

words.meaning: having little water or rain
words.example: The weather is dry in autumn.

words.meaning: a light, gentle wind
words.example: There's a nice breeze today.

words.meaning: very bad weather with strong wind and rain
words.example: A big storm is coming tonight.
words.exampleMeaning: 오늘 밤 큰 폭풍이 올 거예요.

words.meaning: the loud sound during a storm
words.example: I heard thunder in the distance.

words.meaning: a bright flash of light in the sky during a storm
words.example: Lightning struck the tree.

words.meaning: having fog that makes it hard to see
words.example: It's very foggy this morning.

words.meaning: extremely cold
words.example: It's freezing outside today.

words.meaning: not too hot or too cold
words.example: Spring weather is usually mild.

words.meaning: a curved band of colors in the sky after rain
words.example: Look! There's a beautiful rainbow!

words.meaning: a device to protect from rain
words.example: Don't forget your umbrella.

words.meaning: light and heat from the sun
words.example: I love the warm sunshine in spring.

words.meaning: a short period of rain
words.example: There will be showers this afternoon.

words.meaning: a small piece of falling snow
words.example: Each snowflake has a unique shape.

words.meaning: a unit for measuring temperature
words.example: It's 30 degrees Celsius today.

words.meaning: the typical weather of a place over time
words.example: Korea has four distinct seasons.

words.meaning: unpleasantly cold
words.example: It's getting chilly in the evening.

words.meaning: a period of unusually hot weather
words.example: A heatwave hit the country last week.

words.meaning: a flower on a tree or bush
words.example: Cherry blossoms are beautiful in spring.

words.meaning: thin ice that forms on cold surfaces
words.example: There was frost on the car this morning.
